title: Aiblockwarden
author: Aiblockwarden
created_time: March 07, 2023, 09:05:11 PMLast edit: March 11, 2023, 07:16:57 PM by Aiblockwarden
content: Greetings Bitcointalk community!We are thrilled to introduce AIBlockWarden, a groundbreaking AI-powered blockchain project built on the Polygon chain. Our mission is to enhance blockchain security by providing advanced analytical capabilities that identify potential vulnerabilities and prevent attacks before they happen.AIBlockWarden leverage the power of AI to deliver the following benefits:Fraud Detection: Our algorithms help detect fraudulent activities on the network, keeping it secure for all users.Smart Contract Audit: AIBlockWarden analyzes smart contracts to ensure that they are secure and working as intended.Predictive Analytics: We use AI to analyze data and predict potential security threats, ensuring that we can take proactive measures to protect the network.Real-Time Network Monitoring: Our real-time monitoring system ensures that we can identify and respond to security incidents as they happen.Tokenomics:Token Name: AIBlockWardenToken Symbol: WARDTotal Supply: 500,000,000 WARDSmart Contract: 0x3bba00CaDf47d149062bEafbCc3a053342ee1c4cToken Allocation:PreSale: 125,000,000 WARD (25% of total supply)Liquidity: 100,000,000 WARD (20% of total supply)Community: 125,000,000 WARD (25% of total supply)Strategic Partnership: 100,000,000 WARD (20% of total supply)Founding team: 50,000,000 WARD (10% of total supply)The WARD token is used to pay for transaction fees on the platform and also serves as a governance token that allows holders to participate in decision-making processes.To demonstrate our commitment to community engagement, we are excited to announce an airdrop of 5000000 WARD tokens before the Presale. To participate, visit our Telegram bot: https://t.me/AIBlockWardenBot and follow the instructions provided by the bot.For more information about AIBlockWarden, please visit our website at http://aiblockwarden.com and read our whitepaper.We look forward to hearing from you and answering any questions you may have.Best regards,The AIBlockWarden Team

comments.author: Aiblockwarden
comments.body: Hello Bitcointalk community,We are excited to announce the launch of our AIBlockwarden Token Presale on Pinksale, which is now live and accepting contributions.AIBlockwarden is a Next Generation Blockchain Security platform Powered By AI to offer secure, decentralized solutions for data storage, Smart contract audit, and real time Network Monitoring. Our goal is to revolutionize the way data is processed and protected, making it more accessible, secure, and transparent for individuals and organizations.Our presale offers an opportunity for early supporters to get in on the ground floor of this groundbreaking project and benefit from significant discounts and other exclusive incentives. The presale will run for a limited time, so act fast to take advantage of this opportunity.To participate in the AIBlockwarden Token Presale, please visit our Pinksale page and follow the instructions.For more information about AIBlockwarden and our presale, please visit our website or join our Telegram group, where our team members will be available to answer any questions you may have.Thank you for your support.Best regards,AIblockwarden Team
